text: Indian administrative divisions, as of 1951 Elections to the Legislative Assembly of the Indian state of Saurashtra were held on March 26, 1952. 222 candidates contested for the 55 constituencies in the Assembly. There were 5 two-member constituencies and 50 single-member constituencies. ==Results== ==State Reorganization and Merger== On 1 November 1956, Saurashtra State was merged into Bombay State under States Reorganisation Act, 1956. ==See also== * Saurashtra State * 1951–52 elections in India * Bombay State * 1957 Bombay Legislative Assembly election ==References== Category:1952 State Assembly elections in India Category:State Assembly elections in Maharashtra Category:State Assembly elections in Gujarat Category:March 1952 events
title: 1952 Saurashtra Legislative Assembly election
